pullRequest.title: fix: Actually register InputSystem as system
pullRequest.bodyText: There were a couple of NPEs with Dialogs because of this. The dependencies for the InputSystem were not injected via @In because the system was never registered as such. This simple change should solve this issue.

commit.message:
fix: Actually register InputSystem as system

There were a couple of NPEs with Dialogs because of this. The dependencies for the InputSystem were not injected via `@In` because the system was never registered as such. This simple change should solve this issue.

nodes.bodyText:
I wonder if this should be set to Client? It'll otherwise default to Always which means it would also run on a headless server, which seems silly for input handling.
Which makes me wonder what it was doing without the annotation in the first place 🤔 I'm tempted to put a couple fingers in my ears and walk away slowly going "lalalalala" pretending to never having seen this ... 😁
